duties_responsibilities.duty: Configure and deploy authentication services technologies such as SSO, Kerberos, and Federation
Maintain and troubleshoot security products including Ping Identity products, Radiant Logic Virtual directory, and Broadcom (CA Site Minder, CA Directory server)
Utilize logs generated by security products to troubleshoot issues and make improvements
Manage directory servers using command line and standard LDAP commands
Examine and maintain data in the directory servers
Stay updated with the latest developments in authentication services technologies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
